title: Death Valley National Park
description: In December 2012 my family took a trip to Death Valley.

photos.description: A cool wavy shadow on some rocks.
Some more wavy rocks. I guess it's probably wind that does that.
Some very bumpy rocks/mud/salt. I like how flat it seems from a distance.
Some tracks in the snow. I don't remember where exactly this was, but I think it was at a higher elevation than the rest of the trip.
